comment:
Extracted Variables:
- Amount of Fertilizer C (x)
- Amount of Fertilizer Y (y)
- Cost of Fertilizer C ($2 per kg)
- Cost of Fertilizer Y ($3 per kg)
- Nitrous oxide content of Fertilizer C (1.5 units per kg)
- Vitamin mix content of Fertilizer C (3 units per kg)
- Nitrous oxide content of Fertilizer Y (5 units per kg)
- Vitamin mix content of Fertilizer Y (1 unit per kg)

Constraints:
1. 1.5x + 5y \geq 5 (at least 5 units of nitrous oxide)
2. 3x + y \geq 8 (at least 8 units of vitamin mix)

Objective:
Minimize Cost = 2x + 3y

Non-negativity Constraints:
- x \geq 0
- y \geq 0
